produits.name: mechanical keyboard asus rog
produits.description: The Asus ROG Azoth keyboard offers compact, silent performance with wireless convenience. Factory-lubricated switches ensure smooth typing, while silicone reinforcements dampen sound and vibrations. It features three connection types, OLED screen, and RGB backlighting.

codingSchool.descriptif: Apprends à coder un site internet de A à Z
